title: For Danger Mouse and Black Thought, feel is more important than sound
description: Though Black Thought and Danger Mouse have known each other for a very long time, it took a while to complete their debut collaborative album, Cheat Codes.
itunes:title: For Danger Mouse and Black Thought, feel is more important than sound
itunes:author: Stephen Kallao
